thread.title: Fantastic 2nd stay at this wonderful hotel
thread.title_full: Fantastic 2nd stay at this wonderful hotel - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Chatty_Chick18
title: Fantastic 2nd stay at this wonderful hotel
text:
I stayed at this hotel in April 2016 and did not hesitate to book the same hotel in March 2017 to bring my husband as a tenth wedding anniversary gift.
The concierge was extremely helpful prior to arrival and helped me arrange a surprise cake to be in the room on arrival. Additionally, the concierge kindly surprised me too by providing chocolate dipped strawberries and red wine in our room on arrival. This was a wonderful gesture and was completely unexpected but genuinely appreciated.
The room was very nice with an alarm clock that had a USB port and a lightning docking station which enabled charging without the need for a UK to US plug adaptor. There were bath robes in the room and good quality toiletries.
We had cocktails in both Triomphe and Lanterns Keep over our stay. The chocolate martini is delicious.
The hotel is in an excellent location which puts you in the heart of the city.
Overall, a fabulous 2nd stay and if I visit NYC again, this would be my first choice.
